actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow persons receiving military retired pay (other than disability retired pay) to receive concurrently pension or compensation under the laws administered by the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Permits certain veterans with service-connected disabilities who are retired members of the uniformed services to receive compensation concurrently with retired pay, without deduction from either.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to allow persons receiving military retired pay (other than disability retired pay) to receive concurrently pension or compensation under the laws administered by the Veterans' Administration.
